<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Breach time calculation</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.info(new GlideDateTime());

var dueDate = '2024-05-02 08:17:45';
var ctime = new GlideDateTime().getDate();
var dtime = new GlideDateTime(dueDate).getDate();
var difference = dtime.compareTo(ctime);
gs.info("minutes" + difference);// Equals (0) // initDate is after compDate2 (1) // initDate is before compDate3 (-1)


var taskDueDate = new GlideDateTime(dueDate).getNumericValue(); //due date
var currDate = new GlideDateTime().getNumericValue(); //current date
var dateDiff = taskDueDate - currDate; //Still in milliseconds here
dateDiff = dateDiff / 1000;
gs.info("BRdateDiff:" + dateDiff);

if(difference == -1){  //after the due time
gs.info('Overdue');
} 

else if((difference == 0) && ((dateDiff > 0 && dateDiff < 900)) ){ //same day upto 15 min from breach time
gs.info('Approaching');

}

else if((difference == 0) && ((dateDiff < 0) || (dateDiff > 900)) ){ //same day and after 15 min of breach time
gs.info('Overdue');

}

]]></script>
